name: Service Center Payment Report - Individual
report_script:
columns = [
    "Name" + "::120",
    "Payment Done" + "::100",
    "Customer Name" + "::100",
    "Customer Address" + "::100"
]

current_user = frappe.user
current_service_centre = frappe.get_last_doc('Service Centre', {"user": current_user}).name

query = f'''SELECT * FROM `tabIssueRapl` WHERE service_centre="{current_service_centre}" AND payment_done="{filters.payment_done}"'''

my_data = frappe.db.sql(
    query, as_dict=True
)

## Message
message = f'''Service Centre - {current_service_centre}'s payment status for payments that are - {filters.payment_done}'''

## Final
data = columns, my_data, message, None, None
